dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.tip.ServiceAccessPoint
dataStructure.description:
Represents a set of parameters associated (directly or indirectly) with a unique (logical and/or physical) resource where the Service can be accessed.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceAccessPoint

child.name: type
child.description:
Method to group service access points that have strongly marked and readily defined similarities. This attribute is used in the Service Definition to identify the type of SAP required at service activation time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type

child.name: serviceState
child.description:
Indicates the ability of an entity to provide service.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: serviceState

child.name: operationalState
child.description:
Indicates whether the set of resources supporting the service are installed and working.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: operationalState

child.name: adminState
child.description:
Represents the administrative suspension (or resumption) of traffic for a given subscriber.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: adminState

child.name: characteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association CharacteristicValueAppliesToSAP

This association end is optional
child.label: characteristicValue

child.name: service
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceAccessedVia

This association end is optional
child.label: service

child.name: resource
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ResourceServesAs

This association end is optional
child.label: resource

child.name: sapSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SapSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: sapSpec

child.name: commonServiceInfo
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceAccessPointIsExtendedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: commonServiceInfo
